name: Reino de Mallorca
description: Making simple the sells and rentals.
overview:
Young and dynamic company, where the priority is the good treatment of customers and find the ideal home, among other important factors to consider whether an affordable price to the market, an efficient and meet customer needs.

In our page you will find a variety of properties for sale and rent rural properties, houses, townhouses, apartments, attics, ground floors, apartments, town houses, land, buildings, ships and new real estate developments. And if not find what you are looking for, no doubt that we will launch a search as that in a short period of time, will bring the expected results. For reasons of privacy or preference of our customers, a number of properties are not included in the website, but feel free to contact us and we will inform you.

The island of Mallorca, bathed by the warm waters of the Mediterranean sea, magnificent beaches, great food, its culture and leisure and so very cosmopolitan, and certainly with the hospitality of its residents, makes it one of the paradises of the world, fascinating and ideal to take up residency, no doubt.
